Title: Prohibits hospitals, health systems, and health care providers from charging facility fees that are not covered by the patient's health insurance carrier
Summary: Prohibits hospitals, health systems, and health care providers from charging facility fees that are not covered by the patient's health insurance carrier.
LawCode: Amd ยง2830, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting hospitals, health systems, and health care providers from charging facility fees that are not covered by insurance
